list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: atmospheric water vapor frozen into ice crystals and falling in light white flakes or lying on the ground as a white layer.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we were trudging through deep snow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã trỗi dậy qua tuyết sâu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mass of flickering white spots on a television or radar screen, caused by interference or a poor signal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: all that they could pick up on their screens was snow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tất cả những gì họ có thể nhận trên màn hình của họ là tuyết

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a dessert or other dish resembling snow.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's not snowing so heavily now
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bây giờ không có tuyết quá nhiều
